CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_index', false, 'GKtIuruOc5v6odM9Aoucv7yoFc9K0V5pQTEaRD2R3is', 'v3.5.0--GKtIuruOc5v6odM9Aoucv7yoFc9K0V5pQTEaRD2R3is', '6sJcATr1WI7Btz8gB434Net3Y8K9NaVEvLZ3GRgxdko'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_index; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_index (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "cta" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "features" TEXT, "hero" TEXT, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "sections" TEXT, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "testimonials" TEXT, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
UPDATE _content_info SET ready = true WHERE id = 'checksum_index'; -- meta
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_docs', false, 'quFkNIUZZFAwcn0ok74-KsIERem9u0p5DW-cqEgxrPA', 'v3.5.0--quFkNIUZZFAwcn0ok74-KsIERem9u0p5DW-cqEgxrPA', 'DACVbgrcV3ccxWw-hGvGRSQunW7LIZxvGWXFTjw-ALo'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_docs; -- structure

UPDATE _content_info SET ready = true WHERE id = 'checksum_docs'; -- meta
